name: Microsoft D66-00036 Wired Optical Mouse
Features: [Optical Technology, Navigate with better speed, accuracy and reliability—the optical sensor tracks movement on nearly any surface without the hassle of clogged mouse parts., Comfortable in Either Hand, Use your mouse with your left or right hand—ambidextrous design makes it comfortable either way., Scroll Wheel, Save time and effort with the scroll wheel—navigate documents and Web pages without using the on-screen scroll bar., Device Stage, Customizable Buttons, Ergonomic Design]
